transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Haanji.

Customer: Haanji mam VK LED light se baat ho rahi hai?

Executive: Ji ji ji.

Executive: A mam mai Nidhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se Shweta ki senior.

Customer: Ji.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Haanji mam abhi aap se uska discussion hua tha na services ko lekar ke?

Customer: Ji ji ji.

Executive: Haanji to basically kya hai jab bhi aap se koi connect karta hai hamari team se to aapke pass na whatsapp pe ek feedback jata hai to us pe na actually I guess sir ne usme negative feedback de diya hai to mujhe uska reason janna tha.

Customer: Um chaliye kal hum office aate hain baat karke aapko batayenge.

Executive: Kal? Are chutti ha abhi to chutti ho gaya office ka.

Executive: Achcha to mai fir kal kitne baje call kar lu?

Customer: A kal aap mere ko 12 baje phone kariega.

Executive: Kal din me? Mai puch leti hu mai uska reason puch leti hu mai aapko bata dungi, thik hai?

Executive: Aap ek bari puch lijiye unse please aur kyunki ye concern agar raise kiya to ye Shweta ki performance ke liye hota hai matlab agar ya to unhone aapko samjhai nahi sari cheeze achche se ya kya problem aaya hai connect karne ke baad aapne negative diya hai na to aapka vaise video meet vagera pe sab kuch discussion sahi se hua tha unke sath?

Customer: Haan sab kuch sahi se chal raha hai koi dikkat nahi hai madam agar koi dikkat hoga to mai unko direct batati hu mai unko khud call karti hu wo mere ko khud call karti hai. Aisa nahi hai ki koi cheez hum log me chupaye mujhe jo bhi dikkate aati mai turant unko call karti hu wo sara cheez batati hai mere ko kayde se batati hai samjhati bhi bahut achcha hai politely koi bhi confusion hota wo dur karti hai.

Executive: Achcha fir bhi unhone negative de diya na to ye matlab bahut galat cheez hoti hai hamare yaha pe ke kisi bande ne agar call vagera liya aur unko negative de diya gaya to aap please unse ek bari baat karke bata dijiye please.

Customer: To to kya karna hoga mere ko ab bataiye website kholne kya karna hai bataiyega.

Executive: Karna ye hai ke abhi jaise ye concern open ho jata hai isse to mai close karwa rahi hu aapke pass mail pe feedback aayega us pe positive dilwa dijiyega us pe satisfied dilwa dijiyega.

Customer: Mail pe dalwa dijiye.

Executive: Please aap karwa dijiye mam isko please.

Customer: Aap mail pe kariye mai dalwa deti hu aap karo.

Executive: Okay abhi kar rahi hu bas ek minute dijiye.

Customer: Thik hai ya to subah kariye ga madam subah karenge to karwa denge mail to sir pe jayega na sir khali nahi honge is samay time hai.

Executive: Achcha ruk aap kariye hum karwa de rahe hain.

Executive: A aapke pass na do minute me feedback aa jayega mam thik hai aap please usse positive dilwa dijiyega satisfied thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai kya karna hoga usme matlab?

Executive: Bas aapko hoga thik hai.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Bas aapko feedback dena hai aur aapko koi bhi concern rahe to aap account manager ko to call kar hi sakte ho.

Customer: Ji ji ji.

Executive: Thik hai abhi bas do minute me aapke pass aa jayega please sir se bol dijiye thik hai?

Customer: Thik hai.

Executive: Kahin wo negative na de de fir se aap unse bol dijiye please.

Customer: Thik hai.

Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to know reason for negative feedback.

- Customer needs guidance on providing positive feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the impact of negative feedback.

- Executive offered to send a feedback mail.

- Customer agreed to provide positive feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send feedback mail in 2 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, performance, account manager, services
